definitions.definition: A type of bicycle hub incorporating a ratcheting mechanism , with a cassette , or set of sprockets , mounted onto a splined shaft of the hub to engage the chain .
examples: In many high-end and midrange bicycles, freehubs have replaced freewheel systems.

main_definition: A type of bicycle hub incorporating a ratcheting mechanism , with a cassette , or set of sprockets , mounted onto a splined shaft of the hub to engage the chain .
